objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#e6e6e6'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#f9f9f9'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#333333'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#555555'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.05'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#000000'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#222222'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='#444444'/></g><rect x='0' y='850' width='1080' height='230' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='50' y='50' width='980' height='3' fill='#333333'/><rect x='50' y='800' width='980' height='3' fill='#333333'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='50' fill='#000000'/><circle cx='930' cy='150' r='50' fill='#000000'/><circle cx='150' cy='930' r='50' fill='#000000'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='50' fill='#000000'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Height Adjustable | PU Leather | Padded Armrests | 275 lbs Capacity

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern promotional layout centered around a stylish ergonomic office chair. The background utilizes soft gradients with radial circular patterns for depth and subtlety. The top section includes a bold heading (`heading`) in dark gray to draw immediate attention, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) conveying comfort, placed just below in a lighter tone. The main product image (`product_image`) is centrally placed and scaled to prominence. Below it is a feature highlights line (`description`) showcasing benefits in a clean, organized layout. At the bottom, there's a strong price highlight (`price`) in white over a dark gradient bar, followed by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with rounded corners and bold label text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: `#e6e6e6` to `#f9f9f9`
- Accent Gradient (Footer): `#333333` to `#555555`
- Dark Text: `#333333`
- Subdued Text: `#555555`
- Button Background: `#ffffff`
- Button Text: `#333333`
product_color: The product image features a sleek office chair with a refined and modern aesthetic. The dominant color is a smooth ivory white (#F5F5F0) used on the seat and backrest, lending a clean and minimalist look. This is complemented by matte black (#2E2E2E) elements on the armrests, base, and wheels, adding contrast and professionalism. The blend of ivory and black is well-balanced, with soft lighting accentuating the texture of the leather and the contours of the chair, giving it a premium appearance. For a cohesive advertisement banner, use a palette of Ivory White (#F5F5F0), Matte Black (#2E2E2E), Soft Grey (#D6D6D3), and Accent Beige (#EBE6DC).
